title: Cutthroat Graves

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Cutthroat Graves with ingame gameplay! Price: 750RP Skin name is CONFIRMED as Cutthroat Graves, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body:
I'm not sure if this was intentional but can something be done about this reloading bug? A random cannonball orbits Graves every time he reloads. I haven't seen this posted anywhere and I wasn't sure if this was the exact place to post this, as this is my first time creating a discussion on the boards. If there's a way we can get a Riot member to reply to this that'd be great. I really love this skin and I don't think that it being 750 RP excuses something like this. Thank you all in advance!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hey Blightballer,

The video you're referring to is a pre-release video, which means it was taking when the content was still being worked on during the PBE cycle. This issue doesn't appear to be occurring on live.

Oh really? I know I linked the pre-release but I was experiencing that issue just the other day from playing him. I'll give the skin a run and check it out! I'll come back with the results.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

I'm thrilled to say that the skin has finally been fixed with this new patch. Thanks for letting me know. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I'm pretty sure that's just him reloading out the empty shotgun shell.
